title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 19 - Education Practices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 19 - Education Practices

State Regulations
§ 19.1 - Petitions
§ 19.2 - Certificates of religious and denominational institutions
§ 19.3 - Admission data
§ 19.4 - Equality of educational opportunity
§ 19.5 - Prohibition of corporal punishment, aversive interventions, and seclusion and the authorized limited use of timeout and physical restraint
§ 19.6 - Solicitation of charitable donations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 19

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§101, 207, 210, 305, 4401, 4402, 4403, 4410; Constitution, art. VIII, §
1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
